course_recommendations_markdown:
### Recommended Courses for Missing Skills:

#### Cloud Security:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Azure Security and Compliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/paths/azure-security-compliance/)
   - [Cloud Security Fundamentals on Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/cloud-security-fundamentals)
   - [Cybersecurity Basics on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/cyber-security-basics/)
   - [Networking and Security Architecture with VMware NSX on edX](https://www.edx.org/course/networking-and-security-architecture-with-vmware-nsx)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - [Microsoft Security Blog](https://www.microsoft.com/security/blog/)
   - [Cloud Security Alliance](https://cloudsecurityalliance.org/)
   - [SANS Institute](https://www.sans.org/)

#### Solution Design:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Architecting Microsoft Azure Solutions on edX](https://www.edx.org/course/architecting-microsoft-azure-solutions)
   - [Solution Architecture Fundamentals on LinkedIn Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/solution-architecture-fundamentals)
   - [Designing Distributed Systems on Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/distributed-systems-design)
   - [Azure Solutions Architect Design Course on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/microsoft-azure-architect-technologies/)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - [Azure Architecture Center](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/)
   - [The Open Group Architecture Forum](https://www.opengroup.org/architecture)
   - [InfoQ Architecture & Design](https://www.infoq.com/architecture-design/)

#### Infrastructure as Code (IaC):
1. **Courses:**
   - [Azure DevOps Fundamentals on Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/azure-devops-fundamentals)
   - [Infrastructure as Code with Terraform on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/terraform-beginner-to-advanced/)
   - [Introduction to Infrastructure as Code on Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/infrastructure-as-code)
   - [Automating AWS with Infrastructure as Code on LinkedIn Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/automating-aws-with-infrastructure-as-code)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - [Terraform Registry](https://registry.terraform.io/)
   - [Azure Resource Manager Templates](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/templates/)
   - [IaC Best Practices on HashiCorp](https://www.hashicorp.com/resources/infrastructure-as-code-best-practices)

#### Networking:
1. **Courses:**
   - [Azure Networking Fundamentals on Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/azure-networking-fundamentals)
   - [Networking Essentials on Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/learn/computer-networking)
   - [Networking Fundamentals on LinkedIn Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/networking-foundations-network-media-wan-technologies)
   - [Computer Networking Basics on Udemy](https://www.udemy.com/course/computer-networking-basics/)

2. **Learning Websites:**
   - [Azure Networking Documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/networking/)
   - [Cisco Networking Academy](https://www.netacad.com/)
   - [Network Computing](https://www.networkcomputing.com/)

Feel free to explore these resources to enhance your skills in preparation for the Azure Solutions Architect role.
